description: Start with a good chocolate cake recipe. I highly recommend my Crazy Cake if youâ€™re not concerned about fat. (Hint: you can substitute half of the oil in that recipe with apple sauce.) For a healthier cake, Beet-Chocolate Cake would taste truly decadent with this frosting.
name: Vegan German Chocolate Frosting
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup coconut milk (may use lite coconut milk)
1/3 cup cornstarch mixed with 1/4 cup water until smooth

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium saucepan, mix the soymilk, coconut milk, sugar, and vanilla together. Add the cornstarch mixture and cook over medium-high heat, stirring constantly, until mixture boils and thickens. Cook for one minute after it boils. Remove from heat and stir in coconut and pecans.
Allow to cool for about 10 minutes (mixture should still be warm) before spreading on cake.
